an5.226:1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṃ kulesu saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato.
an5.226:1.7: otiṇṇacittassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ: ‘anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṃ carissati aññataraṃ vā saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjissati sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati’.
an5.226:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṃ kulesu saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato”ti.
